message.body: WHY ARE SANSA AND TYRION MARRIED. WHY DID THAT HAVE TO HAPPEN.
hahahahahaha. i forgot that your two favs were shea (sp?) and tyrion. it's actually not that bad.
The funny part is that we always joke that I was Shea and Tyrion was Brent. AND LOOK WE'RE BROKEN UP TOO.
and they're still friends, and you're still friends... hm
And I'm a funny whore. It all works out. :)
WHY IS HALF OF THE STARK FAMILY DEAD IN LESS THAN A MINUTE
not half! unless you count the younger kids as half people
Almost half. TOO MANY DEAD PEOPLE
i never liked whatshisface anyway. sad about the mom, though. and unborn stark jr.
You didn't like Rob? I liked his face and voice. Mmhmmm.
eh. his body was good i guess.
i'm just not thrilled by him.
